description: Unconscious bias, often referred to as implicit bias, encompasses the attitudes and stereotypes that influence our understanding, actions, and decisions in an unconscious manner. It occurs involuntarily and can be influenced by various factors such as upbringing and societal norms.Unconscious bias can exist in many forms, including gender bias, racial bias, age bias, and more.
